@chris_whong @greggersh @kan_academy @wslack @kaitlinbdevine @USDS @18F @NavaPBC @AdHocTeam In my limited experience as a vendor, it generally appears that those with the best lawyers & salespeople win in traditional contracts - not necessarily the ones with the best talent or solutions. They also tend to have long-running deeper relationships than these new startups.

@kaitlinbdevine @wslack @kan_academy @USDS @18F @NavaPBC @AdHocTeam +1. The revolving door has the beneficial side-effect of cross-training in key subject areas and perspectives you cannot get from just being on one side of the fence.
